circumstances: On final approach to New Orleans-Moisant Airport, both engines failed. The aircraft stalled and crashed few miles from the airport. The passenger was seriously injured and the pilot was killed. The aircraft was destroyed.
probable_cause:
Double engine failure, stall and subsequent crash on final approach due to an inadequate preflight preparation. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Mismanagement of fuel, 
- Improper in-flight decisions or planning, 
- Fuel exhaustion, 
- The pilot failed to maintain flying speed, 
- Complete failure of both engines.
